text: Dobycha, kotoruyu Allakh vernul Svoyemu Poslanniku ot zhiteley seleniy, prinadlezhit Allakhu, Poslanniku, rodstvennikam Proroka, sirotam, bednym i putnikam, daby ne dostalas' ona bogatym sredi vas. Berite zhe to, chto dal vam Poslannik, i storonites' togo, chto on zapretil vam. Boytes' Allakha, ved' Allakh surov v nakazanii
